description: The rumors were right. The ancient robot is real. It's rusted and inactive and in need of repair. Can you repair it and gain access to its words of wisdom?

puzzles.description: Make Dash turn on more eye lights each time you clap.  Make Dash finish with a smile.
puzzles.introduction: You can tap Dash gently with a pen to trigger the Clap Heard cue, because to Dash it sounds kind of like a clap. You can pretend it's a screwdriver and you are fixing the robot!

hints.description: Link the states with Clap Heard cues. (If Dash has trouble hearing you clap, try tapping lightly on Dash with a pen or pencil.)

puzzles.description: After smiling, make Dash automatically say a custom message.
puzzles.introduction: What do you think the ancient robot has to say?

hints.description: Record your own message in the Custom Sound to make the ancient robot say something.
